Increase in apparent mortality or unexplained deaths
The Alert ID must be six characters (using lowercase letters a-f and numbers only)
Severe acute respiratory illness in individuals who have traveled to areas where there is circulation of a respiratory virus with potential for serious public health impact

Increased ICU admissions for respiratory illness

MOH | ALERT INVESTIGATION
Please complete this form for every alert that you receive by SMS or Email.
• Please use the Alert ID that was sent in the SMS or Email
• Please ensure the alert form is completed between 48-72 hours after receiving the alert by SMS or Email
• EBS Alert form should be completed within 24 hours after receiving the alert by SMS or email
Two or more cases of severe acute respiratory illness in members of the same family, social group, or work setting (within a 2-week interval)
